# The EPA's Incredible $20 Billion Dollar Caper, Explained

**Source:** Private Instapaper Content  
**Original URL:** instapaper://private-content/1753790592  
**Folders:** Unread, Archive, Starred  

---

EPA’s new chief Lee Zeldin dropped </span><a href="https://substack.com/redirect/429700d6-1f53-42fc-9b95-b6277f710d5b?j=eyJ1IjoiMjlsN28ifQ.F9YUD4JD0BPRahx9F1hKUq-X-x5AFoFdyPBDOoCy8So">a bomb on social media</a><span> Wednesday evening:</span></p><blockquote><p><em>Roughly twenty billion of your tax dollars were parked at an outside financial institution by the Biden EPA. This scheme was the first of its kind in EPA history, and it was purposefully designed to obligate all of the money in a rush job with reduced oversight.</em></p></blockquote><p>It’s a true, crazy, obscene story:</p><div><p><a href="https://substack..FFqP7q8Qjsp-MwpXPQfrL2QwpTHMKoHSQ09o5oAqBoo?&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_source=subscribe-widget&amp;utm_content=157109074"><span>Upgrade to
